title: [K-12] Smartphone-based Medication Dosage Calculation Learning Program for Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of drug dosage calculation concepts
context.additional_context: Cultivating computational skills applicable to real clinical situations through practice-oriented education

learning_goals: Learners can apply accurate medication dosage calculation methods in various clinical scenarios
Learners reduce the likelihood of errors by over 30% by utilizing metacognitive strategies during the calculation process
Learners improve immersion (flow score) by over 15% when solving calculation problems through app-based training
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
